author: daxian-dbw
body:
Fix #5027   Related: #3961

- Update Amazon Linux and OpenSUSE docker files to use the tarball package from powershell release.
- Remove Fedora 24, and add Fedora 25/26
- Move Amazon Linux dockerfile from the `release` folder to the `community` folder because we don't officially support Amazon Linux.
title: Update existing docker files
